test.name: Linux Local Systemd-sc-status

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
kw.msg: ${output} = UNKNOWN: Command error: System has not been booted with systemd as init system (PID 1). Can't operate. - Failed to connect to bus: Host is down

kw.name: Strip String
kw.doc: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces from the given string.
kw.msg: ${output} = UNKNOWN: Command error: System has not been booted with systemd as init system (PID 1). Can't operate. - Failed to connect to bus: Host is down

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
kw.msg:
Wrong result output for: Command: perl /home/ldubrunfaut/centreon-plugins/tests/functional/linux/../../../src/centreon_plugins.pl --plugin=os::linux::local::plugin --mode=systemd-sc-status
Expected output:
Obtained output: UNKNOWN: Command error: System has not been booted with systemd as init system (PID 1). Can't operate. - Failed to connect to bus: Host is down
